item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: About
item.description: a Student having interests in OS, Information Science, Sociology ; loves Command Line, FOSS, Freedom. Skills used: Python3 C HTML Node.js | NPM MariaDB | MySQL | Portage | SQL Docker JSON | XML Git | Repo RaspberryPi Hugo | Markdown | HackMD Scripting | Bash Minecraft Server Tools used: Gentoo | Arch | etc Vi(m) | VSCode VirtualBox | VMWare BurpSuite Nmap WireShark Contact Me Email Feel free to contact to me at :-)
